== Concept ==

The <nowiki>[[Lubuntu-Artwork|Lubuntu Artwork Team]]</nowiki> is pleased to present you the official artwork shipped with the forthcoming version of <nowiki>[[http://lubuntu.net|Lubuntu]]</nowiki>, version 15.10 codename Wily Werewolf. There will be no community wallpapers this season due to its low demand. Anyway, this is a "transitional release", a maintenance-like distro, fixing lots of bugs and improving artwork while we head to a new desktop.
<<BR>><<BR>>

== Wallpaper ==

A new polygon style wallpaper.

== Controls ==

Not many changes here, improvements and a manew re-merge with the Ubuntu branch from Light Themes. Again, we ensure both gtk libraries match, the old GTK2 and new GTK3 ones (no longer look like different environments). Some improvements to Qt support. 

<nowiki>[[File:wily_controls.png]]</nowiki>

== Icons ==

'''Box''' will be updated to version 0.51, improving LXQt desktop integration, with more apps, devices, mimetypes, dialog symbols, panel glyphs and, as always, better colours and metrics. Introducing new Qt elements for toolbars, apps and more LXQt stuff.

<nowiki>[[File:mural_last.png]]</nowiki>
